word_mean: 核果：子房外层形成果皮，中间部形成多汁果肉，内层形成包含种子的硬核的水果，如桃、李和杏

sentence.Network_en: The drupe fruit tree can't fruit in the dysplasia of the plumule.

drupe or berry ; shrubs , small trees , or lianas .核果的或浆果；灌木，小乔木，或藤本植物。

drupe subglobose , 3-4 mm in diam . , densely mixed pilose and glandular-pubescent , red at maturity .核果近球形，直径的3-4毫米，密被有混合具柔毛和腺状短柔毛，成熟时红色。
drupe globose , ca . 4 mm in diam . , mixed pubescent and glandular-pubescent , red at maturity .核果球状，直径约4毫米，混合有短柔毛和腺状短柔毛，成熟时红色。
Fruit a drupe , globose to ovoid., 果一个核果 , 球状到卵球形.
Fruit a drupe , terete or laterally flattened., 果一核果 , 圆柱状或扁平.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Latin drupa 'overripe olive', from Greek druppa 'olive'

means.word_mean: 1. fleshy indehiscent fruit with a single seed: e.g. almond; peach; plum; cherry; elderberry; olive; jujube
